description: Query Express is a simple Query Analyzer look-alike, but being small and free it can be run where the SQL Server client tools are not installed or licensed. This makes it especially useful as a query tool for MSDE and SQL Express. It also connects to Oracle and other OLE-DB compliant databases..
summary: Database Query Tool - MS Query Analyzer look-alike
author: Joseph Albahari,  Timur Fanshteyn
